title: Saurashtra Cement Limited
summary: In continuation to letter dated 24th July, 2025 (Letter No. B/SCL/SE/SS/202/2025-26), we wish to inform you that the annual maintenance activity at the Company s Cement Plant located at Ranavav, Gujarat has been successfully completed.
fullContent: In continuation to letter dated 24th July, 2025 (Letter No. B/SCL/SE/SS/202/2025-26), we wish to inform you that the annual maintenance activity at the Company s Cement Plant located at Ranavav, Gujarat has been successfully completed.We further wish to inform you that operations at the Kiln located at the said plant are scheduled to resume from 9th August, 2025.This disclosure is being made in compliance with Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, read with the Company's Policy on Determination of Materiality of Events.This is for your information and records. |SUBJECT: Commencement of commercial production/operations
